text: Does anyone know of a good way to embed Wistia videos (when you arent using the integration)?
HS seems to have an issue with responsiveness videos and it always makes the videos really small height wise
I know there is this and I have tried it and got it to work with youtube: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/COS-Design-Support/Issues-with-Youtube-Videos-being-re-sized/td-p/2055>

when i was playing around, i saw some hubl that looked like an embed script it was something like:
```
{{ script_something('wisita', 'vidid12232', '')}}
```
but not sure what it was doing as I couldnt find a reference to it anywhere in the docs
their responsive embed works just fine every time i've ever used it
well i feel stupid, i didnt see the code under that one. I really need to stop coding in the wee hours in the night after a few :beers:
lol that can make the best code

Anyone here run into an issue with code in a custom hubl module showing up minified and un-accessible when trying to edit at the page level?  I've been getting this issue intermittently for a while.  It used to resolve itself and display properly after I would open another module built by HubSpot, but I'm currently getting it all the time.  

Getting tired of having to edit at the template level and then create a new page every time I need to make a small change.
